layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x248
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x248
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x232
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 705x232 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 703x230
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 703x226
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 699x226 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 108x36 [color=#0000EE]
                LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 108x36
                  text run at (2,2) width 108: "Xandros"
              LayoutText {#text} at (110,2) size 664x221
                text run at (110,2) width 8: " "
                text run at (118,2) width 545: "in the news. text text text text text text text"
